title: Spaghetti Bolognese
instructions: Heat olive oil in a pan.
Add onion and garlic; sauté.
Brown the ground beef.
Add tomatoes and simmer.
Boil spaghetti and drain.
Combine and serve.

title: Pizza Margherita
instructions: Spread tomato sauce on dough.
Add mozzarella and basil.
Bake until crust is golden.
Drizzle olive oil and serve.

title: Shakshuka
instructions: Cook onion, garlic, and pepper in oil.
Add tomatoes and spices.
Make small wells and crack eggs.
Cover and cook until eggs set.
Serve with bread.

title: Spicy Arrabiata Penne
instructions: Cook penne until al dente.
Sauté garlic and chili in oil.
Add tomatoes; simmer.
Toss with pasta and basil; season and serve.

title: Teriyaki Chicken Casserole
instructions: Whisk soy sauce, sugar, garlic, ginger; thicken with cornstarch.
Bake chicken with sauce until cooked; shred.
Combine rice, vegetables, chicken and sauce; bake briefly and serve.

title: Beef Wellington
instructions: Sear beef; brush with mustard.
Cook mushroom duxelles with shallot and garlic.
Wrap beef with prosciutto and duxelles in pastry.
Glaze with egg; bake until golden and medium-rare.

title: Kedgeree
instructions: Poach haddock in milk; flake.
Cook rice; boil eggs and quarter.
Sauté onion with curry powder; fold in rice and fish.
Top with eggs and parsley; serve warm.

title: Kapsalon
instructions: Bake or fry fries until crisp.
Top with hot doner meat and cheese; melt.
Add salad and sauces; serve immediately.

title: Yaki Udon
instructions: Cook udon; drain.
Stir-fry vegetables.
Add noodles and sauce; toss to coat.
Serve hot.

title: Eton Mess
instructions: Whip cream to soft peaks.
Fold in crushed meringues and chopped strawberries.
Spoon into glasses; garnish and serve.

title: Lasagne
instructions: Sauté onion, carrot, celery and garlic in olive oil.
Add beef; cook until browned. Stir in tomatoes, paste, oregano, salt and pepper; simmer.
Layer sauce, sheets and cheeses in a baking dish.
Repeat layers and finish with cheese on top.
Bake at 200°C until bubbly and golden (about 30 minutes).

title: Chicken Handi
instructions: Fry onions in oil until golden; add garlic and ginger.
Stir in spices; cook briefly until fragrant.
Add tomatoes; cook down to a thick masala.
Add chicken; cook through. Stir in yogurt and cream to finish.
Garnish with cilantro; serve with naan or rice.

title: Katsu Chicken Curry
instructions: Make sauce: sauté onion, garlic and carrot; add curry powder and flour.
Whisk in stock, soy and honey; simmer until thick; finish with garam masala.
Season chicken; coat in flour, egg, then panko.
Shallow-fry until crisp and cooked through.
Slice chicken; serve over rice with curry sauce.

title: Massaman Beef Curry
instructions: Brown beef in a little oil; set aside.
Fry curry paste; add coconut milk to form a sauce.
Return beef with onions and potatoes; simmer until tender.
Season with fish sauce and palm sugar.
Stir in peanuts; finish with lime. Serve with jasmine rice.

title: Pad See Ew
instructions: Soak or loosen noodles per package.
Stir-fry garlic in oil; add chicken and cook.
Push aside; scramble egg.
Add noodles, sauces and sugar; toss on high heat until charred in spots.
Add Chinese broccoli; stir-fry briefly and season with white pepper.

title: Fish Pie
instructions: Boil potatoes and mash with butter, milk and nutmeg.
Make a white sauce; stir in cream and season.
Fold poached flaked fish and onions into sauce.
Top with mash and bake until golden.

title: Ribollita
instructions: Sauté onion, carrot, celery and garlic in olive oil.
Add tomatoes, herbs and beans; simmer.
Stir in torn bread and kale until thick and hearty.
Season and serve with more olive oil.

title: Wontons
instructions: Mix pork with aromatics and seasonings.
Fill wrappers and seal.
Boil until they float or deep-fry until golden.
Serve with dipping sauce.

title: Poutine
instructions: Fry potatoes until crisp; season.
Top with cheese curds.
Ladle hot gravy over and serve immediately.

title: Big Mac
instructions: Form and grill beef patties; season.
Toast buns.
Assemble with sauce, lettuce, cheese, pickles and onion.

title: Koshari
instructions: Cook lentils, rice and macaroni separately.
Make spiced tomato sauce and crispy onions.
Layer rice, pasta, lentils and chickpeas; spoon over sauce and onions.

title: Dal Fry
instructions: Boil dal until tender.
Make tempering with ghee, seeds, garlic, ginger and spices.
Add tomatoes; simmer, then stir into dal.
Adjust seasoning and serve.

title: Timbits
instructions: Make a soft dough from dry and wet ingredients.
Scoop small balls and fry until golden.
Drain and roll in cinnamon sugar.

title: Moussaka
instructions: Fry aubergine slices and par-cook potato.
Cook meat sauce with onion, garlic and tomato.
Layer vegetables and meat; top with yogurt-egg mixture and parmesan.
Bake until golden.

title: Pancakes
instructions: Whisk dry ingredients; add milk and eggs to make batter.
Cook scoops on a buttered pan until bubbles form; flip.
Serve warm, optionally with berries.

title: Beef Bourguignon
instructions: Brown beef and vegetables in butter.
Add wine, garlic, and thyme; simmer until tender.
Serve with bread or potatoes.

title: Butter Chicken
instructions: Cook chicken in butter until browned.
Add onion, garlic, ginger, spices, and tomato puree.
Stir in cream; simmer until thickened.

title: Ratatouille
instructions: Slice vegetables evenly.
Layer in a dish with olive oil and herbs.
Bake until tender and fragrant.

title: Clam Chowder
instructions: Cook bacon, onion, and celery in butter.
Add flour, clams, potatoes, and broth.
Simmer; stir in cream before serving.

title: Tandoori Chicken
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt, lemon juice, and spices.
Roast or grill until cooked through.
Serve hot with naan or rice.

title: Shepherd’s Pie
instructions: Cook lamb with vegetables and gravy.
Top with mashed potatoes.
Bake until golden.

title: Ceviche
instructions: Dice fish and marinate in lime juice until opaque.
Mix with onions, chili, and cilantro.
Serve chilled with tortillas.

title: Beef Pho
instructions: Simmer broth with spices and onion.
Cook noodles separately.
Assemble bowl with noodles, beef, and hot broth.

title: Pasta Carbonara
instructions: Cook spaghetti and pancetta.
Whisk eggs with parmesan.
Combine pasta with egg mixture; serve creamy.

title: Beef Tacos
instructions: Cook beef with taco seasoning.
Fill shells with beef and toppings.
Serve immediately.

title: Beef Stroganoff
instructions: Sauté beef, onions, and mushrooms.
Add mustard and sour cream.
Serve with egg noodles.

title: Chili Con Carne
instructions: Cook beef, onion, and garlic.
Add beans, tomatoes, and spices.
Simmer until flavors blend.

title: Falafel
instructions: Blend chickpeas with herbs and spices.
Form into balls and fry until crisp.
Serve with pita or salad.

title: French Onion Soup
instructions: Caramelize onions in butter.
Add broth and thyme; simmer.
Serve with toasted baguette and melted cheese.

title: Chicken Alfredo
instructions: Cook pasta and set aside.
Sauté chicken and garlic in butter.
Add cream and parmesan; toss with pasta.

title: Chicken Parmigiana
instructions: Bread and fry chicken.
Top with sauce and cheese.
Bake until golden and melted.

title: Beef Enchiladas
instructions: Cook beef and onion with spices.
Fill tortillas, roll, and place in dish.
Cover with sauce and cheese; bake.

title: Lobster Bisque
instructions: Cook vegetables in butter.
Add lobster shells, broth, and sherry.
Strain and stir in cream.

title: Paella
instructions: Cook chicken and onion in olive oil.
Add rice, saffron, broth, and seafood.
Simmer until rice is tender.

title: Ramen
instructions: Simmer broth with miso, soy, and aromatics.
Cook noodles separately.
Assemble with pork, egg, and toppings.

title: Shrimp Scampi
instructions: Cook pasta and set aside.
Sauté shrimp in butter and garlic.
Toss with pasta, lemon juice, and parsley.

title: Beef Bulgogi
instructions: Marinate beef in soy, sesame, garlic, and pear.
Grill or stir-fry quickly.
Serve with rice.

title: Jollof Rice
instructions: Blend tomatoes, peppers, and onion.
Cook with spices and rice.
Simmer with chicken until tender.

title: Chinese Dumplings
instructions: Make dough with flour and water.
Fill with pork and cabbage mix.
Boil or steam until cooked.

title: Greek Salad
instructions: Chop vegetables and mix in a bowl.
Top with feta and olives.
Drizzle with olive oil and oregano.

title: Gnocchi
instructions: Boil and mash potatoes.
Mix with flour and egg; shape gnocchi.
Boil until they float; toss with butter and sage.

title: Pav Bhaji
instructions: Mash boiled vegetables with spices and butter.
Toast bread rolls.
Serve bhaji with buttered pav.

title: Beef Rendang
instructions: Blend spices into paste; fry until fragrant.
Add beef and coconut milk.
Simmer until beef is tender and sauce is thick.

title: Bibimbap
instructions: Cook rice and prepare vegetables separately.
Top rice with beef, vegetables, and fried egg.
Serve with gochujang.

title: Goulash
instructions: Brown beef and onions with paprika.
Add vegetables and broth.
Simmer until tender.

title: Hummus
instructions: Blend chickpeas, tahini, garlic, and lemon juice.
Drizzle with olive oil.
Serve with pita.

title: Beef Empanadas
instructions: Cook beef with onion, garlic, and spices.
Fill dough circles, fold, and seal.
Bake or fry until golden.

title: Chicken Fajitas
instructions: Marinate sliced chicken with lime and spices.
Sear chicken with peppers and onions.
Serve in warm tortillas.

title: Caprese Salad
instructions: Slice tomatoes and mozzarella.
Layer with basil leaves.
Drizzle oil and balsamic; season.

title: Chicken Satay
instructions: Marinate chicken with soy, garlic, ginger.
Grill on skewers.
Serve with peanut sauce.

title: Mushroom Risotto
instructions: Sauté onion and mushrooms in butter.
Toast rice; deglaze with wine.
Add stock gradually; finish with parmesan.

title: Tiramisu
instructions: Whisk yolks with sugar; fold in mascarpone.
Dip ladyfingers in espresso; layer with cream.
Chill and dust with cocoa.

title: Pad Thai
instructions: Soak noodles.
Stir-fry shrimp and egg; add noodles and sauce.
Toss with sprouts and peanuts.

title: Tom Yum Soup
instructions: Simmer aromatics in water.
Add shrimp and seasonings.
Finish with lime juice.

title: Pierogi
instructions: Make dough; prepare potato-onion-cheese filling.
Fill, seal, and boil until floating.
Serve with buttered onions and sour cream.

title: Borscht
instructions: Sauté vegetables.
Add broth; simmer until tender.
Serve with dill and sour cream.

title: Spanish Omelette
instructions: Slow-fry potatoes and onions.
Mix with beaten eggs.
Cook both sides until set.

title: Churros
instructions: Make choux-like dough.
Pipe and fry until golden.
Toss in cinnamon sugar.

title: Apple Pie
instructions: Toss apples with sugar and cinnamon.
Fill pastry; top and crimp.
Bake until golden and bubbly.

title: Carrot Cake
instructions: Mix wet and dry; fold carrots and nuts.
Bake until set.
Frost with cream cheese icing.

title: Strawberry Cheesecake
instructions: Press crumb base; bake briefly.
Beat filling; pour and bake.
Top with strawberries.

title: Chicken Shawarma
instructions: Marinate chicken with yogurt, spices, lemon.
Roast and slice thinly.
Serve in pita with toppings.

title: Beef Burrito
instructions: Cook beef with spices.
Layer fillings on warm tortilla.
Roll tightly and serve.

title: Niçoise Salad
instructions: Boil potatoes and eggs; blanch beans.
Arrange with tuna and vegetables.
Drizzle vinaigrette.

title: Sushi Maki
instructions: Cook and season rice.
Place rice on nori; add fillings.
Roll and slice.

title: Fresh Spring Rolls
instructions: Soak rice paper.
Fill with shrimp, noodles, and herbs.
Roll tight; serve with sauce.

title: Chicken Pho (Phở Gà)
instructions: Simmer chicken with aromatics for clear broth.
Cook noodles.
Assemble bowls and ladle hot broth.

title: Braised Beef Brisket
instructions: Sear brisket; add aromatics and paste.
Cover with stock; braise until tender.
Rest and slice.

title: Butternut Squash Soup
instructions: Roast squash.
Simmer with vegetables and stock.
Blend smooth; add cream.

title: Fish and Chips
instructions: Make batter with flour and beer.
Fry fish until crisp.
Serve with chips and vinegar.

title: Coq au Vin
instructions: Brown chicken and bacon.
Add vegetables and wine; simmer.
Cook until tender.

title: Yakitori
instructions: Skewer chicken and scallions.
Grill, basting with tare sauce.
Serve hot.

title: Gazpacho
instructions: Blend vegetables with oil and vinegar.
Chill until cold.
Serve with chopped veggies.

title: Beef Ramen
instructions: Simmer stock with miso and soy.
Cook noodles; sear beef.
Assemble bowls with egg and scallions.

title: Beef Lasagna
instructions: Cook beef with onion, garlic, and tomato sauce.
Layer with lasagna sheets and ricotta.
Top with mozzarella and bake.

title: Minestrone Soup
instructions: Cook onion, garlic, and vegetables.
Add beans, tomatoes, pasta, and stock.
Simmer until tender.

title: Panna Cotta
instructions: Heat cream with sugar and vanilla.
Stir in gelatin; pour into molds.
Chill and serve with berries.

title: Beef Meatballs
instructions: Mix beef with breadcrumbs, egg, garlic, and cheese.
Form balls and brown in pan.
Simmer in tomato sauce.

title: Beef Fajitas
instructions: Marinate beef with lime and spices.
Sear with peppers and onions.
Serve in tortillas.

title: Stuffed Peppers
instructions: Cook rice and beef with onion and garlic.
Stuff into peppers with sauce.
Top with cheese and bake.

title: Spaghetti alle Vongole
instructions: Cook pasta until al dente.
Sauté garlic, add clams and wine.
Toss with pasta and parsley.

title: Pumpkin Soup
instructions: Cook vegetables until soft.
Blend with stock until smooth.
Stir in cream and season.

title: Key Lime Pie
instructions: Press crumb base and bake lightly.
Mix filling with yolks, milk, and lime.
Bake until set; chill before serving.

title: Banana Bread
instructions: Mash bananas and mix with wet ingredients.
Fold in dry ingredients.
Bake until golden and cooked through.

title: Gnocchi Bolognese
instructions: Cook beef with onion and garlic.
Add tomato sauce; simmer.
Toss with gnocchi and parmesan.

title: Eggplant Parmesan
instructions: Bread and fry eggplant slices.
Layer with sauce and cheese.
Bake until golden.

title: Fish Curry
instructions: Cook onion, garlic, and ginger with spices.
Add fish and coconut milk.
Simmer until tender.

title: Pesto Pasta
instructions: Blend basil, pine nuts, garlic, and oil into pesto.
Cook pasta; toss with pesto.
Top with parmesan.

title: Beef Kebabs
instructions: Marinate beef with oil and garlic.
Skewer with vegetables.
Grill until cooked.

title: Beef Pilaf
instructions: Sear beef; add onion and carrot.
Add rice, stock, and spices.
Simmer until rice is tender.

title: Crème Brûlée
instructions: Heat cream with vanilla.
Whisk yolks with sugar; temper with cream.
Bake in ramekins; chill and torch sugar top.

title: Miso Soup
instructions: Heat dashi stock.
Dissolve miso; add tofu and wakame.
Serve hot with scallions.

title: Croissants
instructions: Make yeast dough.
Laminate with butter into layers.
Shape, proof, and bake golden.

title: Ratatouille Pasta
instructions: Cook vegetables until soft.
Mix with cooked pasta.
Season with olive oil and herbs.

title: Beef Biryani
instructions: Marinate beef with yogurt and spices.
Cook onions, tomatoes, and beef until tender.
Layer with rice and steam until flavors combine.

title: Chicken Biryani
instructions: Marinate chicken with yogurt and spices.
Cook onions and tomatoes, then add chicken.
Layer with rice and cook on low heat until done.

title: Malai Kofta
instructions: Make kofta balls with mashed potatoes and paneer.
Fry until golden brown.
Cook curry sauce with onions, tomatoes, cream, and spices.
Add koftas and simmer gently.

title: Lobster Roll
instructions: Mix lobster meat with mayonnaise, lemon juice, and celery.
Toast buttered buns until golden.
Fill buns with lobster mixture and serve.

title: Clam Linguine
instructions: Cook linguine until al dente.
Sauté garlic in olive oil, add clams and white wine.
Toss pasta with sauce and sprinkle with parsley.

title: Fried Rice
instructions: Cook rice and let it cool.
Scramble eggs, then stir-fry vegetables.
Add rice and soy sauce, stir-frying until hot.

title: General Tso's Chicken
instructions: Coat chicken in cornstarch and fry until crispy.
Cook sauce with soy, garlic, ginger, sugar, and vinegar.
Toss fried chicken in sauce and serve.

title: Kung Pao Chicken
instructions: Stir-fry chicken until browned.
Add vegetables, peanuts, and chili peppers.
Toss with soy-garlic sauce and serve.

title: Mapo Tofu
instructions: Cook pork with garlic, ginger, and chili bean paste.
Add tofu cubes and simmer in sauce.
Garnish with scallions and serve hot.

title: Sweet and Sour Pork
instructions: Coat pork in cornstarch and fry until crispy.
Cook sauce with vinegar, sugar, soy, and pineapple.
Toss pork and vegetables in sauce.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices.
Grill or sear until cooked.
Simmer in tomato cream sauce until thickened.

title: Fettuccine Alfredo
instructions: Cook pasta until al dente.
Melt butter and cream in a pan.
Add parmesan, season, and toss with pasta.

title: Beef Korma
instructions: Cook onion, garlic, and ginger with spices.
Add beef and brown.
Simmer with yogurt and cream until tender.

title: Chicken Chow Mein
instructions: Boil noodles until soft.
Stir-fry chicken and vegetables.
Add noodles and sauce, toss to combine.

title: Cannoli
instructions: Make dough, roll, and shape into tubes.
Fry shells until crisp.
Fill with ricotta cream and chocolate chips.

title: Seafood Paella
instructions: Sauté onion and peppers in olive oil.
Add rice and saffron, toast lightly.
Simmer with stock, then add seafood until cooked.

title: Chicken Kiev
instructions: Stuff chicken with garlic butter.
Coat with flour, egg, and breadcrumbs.
Fry until golden and finish in oven.

title: Beef Poutine Deluxe
instructions: Fry potatoes into crispy fries.
Prepare beef gravy with onions.
Layer fries, cheese curds, and gravy with beef.

title: Chicken Quesadilla
instructions: Cook chicken and vegetables with spices.
Place mixture on tortilla with cheese.
Grill until golden and cheese melts.

title: French Crêpes
instructions: Mix flour, eggs, and milk into thin batter.
Cook thin layers on greased pan.
Fill or top with sweet or savory fillings.

title: Osso Buco
instructions: Brown veal shanks in olive oil.
Sauté vegetables and deglaze with wine.
Simmer with tomato and stock until tender.

title: Baklava
instructions: Layer phyllo with butter and nuts.
Bake until golden.
Pour honey syrup over hot pastry.

title: Beef Moussaka
instructions: Fry eggplant and potatoes.
Layer with beef sauce.
Top with béchamel and cheese, bake until golden.

title: Clam Linguine
instructions: Cook linguine until al dente.
Sauté garlic and chili in olive oil.
Add clams and wine, steam until opened. Toss with pasta.

title: Beef Biryani
instructions: Cook spiced beef curry.
Layer parboiled rice and beef curry.
Steam until flavors combine.

title: Beef Souvlaki
instructions: Marinate beef in lemon, garlic, and oregano.
Grill skewers until cooked.
Serve with pita and yogurt sauce.

title: Stuffed Cabbage Rolls
instructions: Blanch cabbage leaves.
Fill with rice and beef mixture.
Simmer in tomato sauce until tender.

title: Cassoulet
instructions: Cook beans until tender.
Layer with meats and vegetables.
Bake slowly until thick and flavorful.

title: Gnocchi alla Sorrentina
instructions: Cook gnocchi until they float.
Toss with tomato sauce.
Bake with mozzarella and parmesan until bubbly.

title: Irish Stew
instructions: Layer lamb and vegetables in a pot.
Cover with stock and simmer slowly.
Cook until meat is tender.

title: Chicken Cacciatore
instructions: Brown chicken pieces.
Sauté onion, mushroom, and garlic.
Simmer with tomato and wine until cooked.

title: Egg Fried Rice
instructions: Scramble eggs and set aside.
Stir-fry vegetables and rice.
Mix in eggs and soy sauce.

title: Pork Tonkatsu
instructions: Coat pork cutlets in flour, egg, and panko.
Fry until golden and crispy.
Serve with tonkatsu sauce.

title: Shrimp Étouffée
instructions: Make a roux with butter and flour.
Add vegetables and seasonings.
Simmer with shrimp until cooked.

title: Korean Beef Galbi
instructions: Marinate short ribs in soy, garlic, ginger, and sesame oil.
Grill until caramelized and tender.

title: Beef Lo Mein
instructions: Boil noodles until soft.
Stir-fry beef and vegetables.
Toss with noodles and sauce.

title: Creamy Polenta
instructions: Whisk cornmeal into simmering milk.
Cook until thick and creamy.
Stir in butter and parmesan.

title: Hot Beef Manhattan
instructions: Place beef on bread slices.
Top with mashed potatoes.
Pour gravy generously over all.

title: Stuffed Eggplant
instructions: Hollow out eggplants.
Fill with beef, rice, and vegetables.
Bake until tender and golden.

title: Beef Nachos
instructions: Cook beef with spices.
Layer chips with beef and cheese.
Bake until cheese melts, top with garnishes.

title: Pierna Asada (Roast Pork Leg)
instructions: Marinate pork leg in garlic, citrus, and spices.
Roast slowly until tender and juicy.

title: Cullen Skink
instructions: Simmer haddock in milk, remove and flake.
Add potatoes and onions to milk, cook until soft.
Return fish, season, and serve hot.

title: Arancini
instructions: Form cold risotto into balls with cheese centers.
Coat in egg and breadcrumbs.
Fry until golden brown.

title: Lobster Roll
instructions: Mix lobster with mayo, lemon, and celery.
Toast buns with butter.
Fill buns generously with lobster mixture.

title: Pollo Asado
instructions: Marinate chicken in citrus and spices.
Grill or roast until golden and juicy.

title: Matzo Ball Soup
instructions: Mix matzo meal with eggs and fat, chill.
Shape into balls and simmer in chicken stock.
Serve with vegetables.

title: Beef Kharcho
instructions: Brown beef and onion.
Add rice, walnuts, and tomato paste.
Simmer with spices until rich and tender.

title: Sauerbraten
instructions: Marinate beef in vinegar, wine, and spices for days.
Slowly braise with vegetables until tender.
Finish with gingersnap-thickened sauce.

title: Couscous Royale
instructions: Cook meats with vegetables and spices.
Steam couscous until fluffy.
Serve meats and broth over couscous.

title: Beef Chimichangas
instructions: Fill tortillas with beef and cheese.
Fold and deep fry until golden.
Serve with salsa and sour cream.

title: Beef Sinigang
instructions: Boil beef until tender.
Add tamarind, vegetables, and seasonings.
Simmer until sour and flavorful.

title: Shrimp Tempura
instructions: Mix light batter with cold water.
Dip shrimp and fry until crispy.

title: Lamb Tagine
instructions: Brown lamb with onion and garlic.
Add spices, tomato, and dried fruit.
Simmer slowly until fragrant and tender.

title: Beef Kotleti
instructions: Mix beef with soaked bread, onion, and egg.
Shape into patties and pan-fry until browned.

title: Niku Udon
instructions: Prepare dashi with soy and mirin.
Add beef and onion, simmer briefly.
Serve with cooked udon noodles.

title: Spanish Flan
instructions: Caramelize sugar in molds.
Mix milk, eggs, and vanilla.
Bake custard in water bath until set.

title: Caldo de Res
instructions: Simmer beef with vegetables until tender.
Serve hot with lime and tortillas.

title: Pasta Puttanesca
instructions: Sauté garlic and anchovies in olive oil.
Add tomato, olives, and capers.
Toss with spaghetti until coated.

title: Stuffed Zucchini
instructions: Hollow out zucchinis.
Fill with lamb, rice, and vegetables.
Simmer in tomato sauce until tender.

title: Chicken Fricassée
instructions: Brown chicken and set aside.
Cook vegetables and deglaze with wine.
Simmer chicken in cream sauce until tender.

title: Fish Tacos
instructions: Season and grill fish.
Assemble tacos with cabbage and cream sauce.
Squeeze lime and serve.

title: Beef Osso Buco
instructions: Brown beef shanks.
Add vegetables, tomato, and wine.
Simmer with stock until tender.

title: Clam Risotto
instructions: Sauté onion and garlic.
Add rice and toast lightly.
Deglaze with wine, add stock gradually, finish with clams.

title: Pork Adobo
instructions: Marinate pork in soy, vinegar, and garlic.
Simmer with bay leaves and peppercorns until tender.

title: Mulligatawny Soup
instructions: Sauté onion, carrot, and apple with curry.
Add chicken, rice, and stock.
Simmer until flavors blend.

title: Pork Gyoza
instructions: Mix pork with cabbage and seasonings.
Wrap in gyoza skins.
Pan-fry and steam until golden.

title: Beef Bobotie
instructions: Soak bread in milk and mix with beef.
Add spices and onions, bake with egg custard topping.

title: Shrimp Gumbo
instructions: Make roux and cook vegetables.
Add sausage, shrimp, and stock.
Simmer until rich and thick.

title: Beef Shawarma
instructions: Marinate beef in yogurt, lemon, and spices.
Grill and slice thin.
Serve in pita with sauce and vegetables.

title: Stuffed Salmon
instructions: Butterfly salmon fillet.
Stuff with spinach and cream cheese.
Bake until flaky and tender.

title: Tortilla Soup
instructions: Simmer tomato, onion, and garlic in stock.
Add fried tortilla strips.
Serve with avocado and lime.

title: Veal Saltimbocca
instructions: Layer veal with prosciutto and sage.
Sauté in butter, deglaze with wine.

title: Beef Cachapas
instructions: Make batter with corn and cornmeal.
Cook pancakes and fill with beef and cheese.

title: Pasta Primavera
instructions: Cook pasta until al dente.
Sauté vegetables lightly.
Toss with pasta and parmesan.

title: Beef Menudo
instructions: Boil tripe until tender.
Add hominy, chili, and seasonings.
Simmer until rich and hearty.

title: Pumpkin Pie
instructions: Mix pumpkin with eggs, sugar, and spices.
Pour into pie crust.
Bake until set and golden.

title: Chicken Tortellini Soup
instructions: Simmer chicken and vegetables in stock.
Add tortellini and cook until tender.
Season and serve hot.

title: Beef Empanada Pie
instructions: Cook beef with onion, tomato, and spices.
Fill pie crust and cover with top layer.
Bake until golden and crisp.

title: Beef Cacciatore
instructions: Brown beef with onion and garlic.
Add tomato, mushroom, and wine.
Simmer until beef is tender.

title: Crab Cakes
instructions: Mix crab with breadcrumbs, egg, and mayo.
Shape into patties and pan-fry until golden.

title: Salisbury Steak
instructions: Mix beef with egg and breadcrumbs, shape patties.
Brown patties and simmer in mushroom gravy.

title: Stuffed Pasta Shells
instructions: Boil pasta shells until tender.
Fill with ricotta and spinach mixture.
Bake with tomato sauce and mozzarella.

title: Clam Fritters
instructions: Mix chopped clams with batter.
Drop spoonfuls into hot oil and fry until golden.

title: Chicken Pot Pie
instructions: Cook chicken and vegetables in cream sauce.
Fill pie crust and cover with top.
Bake until golden and bubbling.

title: Shrimp Cocktail
instructions: Boil shrimp until pink.
Chill and serve with cocktail sauce and lemon.

title: Mapo Tofu
instructions: Stir-fry beef with garlic and ginger.
Add tofu, chili paste, and seasonings.
Simmer briefly and garnish with green onion.

title: Spanakopita
instructions: Layer phyllo with butter and spinach-feta mixture.
Bake until golden and crisp.

title: Chicken Tetrazzini
instructions: Cook spaghetti and mix with chicken, mushroom, and cream.
Top with cheese and crumbs, bake until golden.

title: Cajun Jambalaya
instructions: Cook chicken and sausage with vegetables.
Add rice, tomato, and stock.
Simmer until rice is tender, add shrimp at the end.

title: Beef Carpaccio
instructions: Slice beef paper-thin.
Arrange with arugula and parmesan.
Drizzle with olive oil and lemon.

title: Pork Stroganoff
instructions: Cook pork with onion and mushroom.
Add paprika and stock.
Stir in sour cream before serving.

title: Stuffed Chicken Breast
instructions: Butterfly chicken breast.
Stuff with spinach and cheese.
Bake until cooked through.

title: Beef Barbacoa
instructions: Season and slow-cook beef with spices.
Shred and serve in tacos or bowls.

title: Beef Karaage
instructions: Marinate beef in soy, garlic, and ginger.
Coat with potato starch.
Deep-fry until golden and crisp.

title: Chicken Enchilada Casserole
instructions: Layer tortillas with chicken, beans, sauce, and cheese.
Bake until bubbly and golden.

title: Seafood Chow Mein
instructions: Boil noodles until soft.
Stir-fry seafood and vegetables.
Add noodles and sauce, toss well.

title: Beef Samosas
instructions: Cook beef with onion, peas, and spices.
Fill pastry sheets, fold, and seal.
Fry until golden and crisp.

title: Beef Ravioli
instructions: Prepare pasta dough and roll thin.
Fill with beef mixture and seal.
Boil until cooked, serve with tomato sauce.

title: Shrimp Pad Kee Mao
instructions: Soak rice noodles until soft.
Stir-fry shrimp with garlic and chili.
Add noodles and sauces, toss with basil.

title: Chicken Biryani
instructions: Cook spiced chicken curry.
Layer with parboiled rice.
Steam until fragrant and flavorful.

title: Beef Fajita Bowl
instructions: Sear beef strips with peppers and onions.
Serve over rice with beans and salsa.

title: Shrimp Paella
instructions: Sauté onion and peppers in oil.
Add rice and saffron.
Simmer with stock, add shrimp to finish.

title: Pork Bao Buns
instructions: Steam bao buns until fluffy.
Cook pork belly with soy and hoisin.
Fill buns with pork, cucumber, and scallion.

title: Lobster Thermidor
instructions: Cook lobster and remove meat.
Mix with creamy sauce and stuff back into shells.
Bake until golden on top.

title: Chili Dogs
instructions: Grill sausages and place in buns.
Top with chili, cheese, and onion.

title: Beef Seekh Kebab
instructions: Mix beef with spices and onion.
Shape onto skewers.
Grill until charred and cooked.

title: Seafood Bisque
instructions: Cook shells for stock.
Simmer with tomato and cream.
Blend smooth and strain.

title: Beef Lasagna Rolls
instructions: Spread ricotta and beef on lasagna sheets.
Roll up and place in baking dish.
Top with sauce and mozzarella, bake.

title: Stuffed Pork Chops
instructions: Butterfly pork chops.
Stuff with spinach, cheese, and crumbs.
Bake until juicy.

title: Chicken Makhani (Butter Chicken)
instructions: Cook chicken in butter.
Simmer in spiced tomato cream sauce.
Serve with rice or naan.

title: Shrimp Curry
instructions: Sauté onion, garlic, and ginger with spices.
Add tomato and coconut milk.
Simmer with shrimp until cooked.

title: Beef Tamales
instructions: Soak corn husks until pliable.
Spread masa and fill with beef mixture.
Wrap and steam until firm.

title: Chicken Korma
instructions: Cook onion, garlic, and ginger with spices.
Add chicken, yogurt, and almonds.
Simmer in cream until tender.

title: Hungarian Gulyás Soup
instructions: Brown beef with onion and paprika.
Add vegetables and water.
Simmer until beef and potatoes are tender.

title: Shrimp Fried Rice
instructions: Scramble eggs and set aside.
Stir-fry shrimp and vegetables.
Add rice, soy sauce, and eggs, toss well.

title: Beef Bulgur Pilaf
instructions: Brown beef and onion.
Stir in tomato paste and bulgur.
Add water and cook until absorbed.

title: Beef Lo Mein Noodles
instructions: Boil noodles until soft.
Stir-fry beef and vegetables.
Toss with noodles and sauce.

title: Stuffed Bell Peppers
instructions: Hollow out peppers.
Fill with beef, rice, and vegetables.
Bake in tomato sauce until tender.

title: Chicken Lo Mein
instructions: Cook noodles until tender.
Stir-fry chicken and vegetables.
Toss with noodles and sauce.

title: Classic Beef Hamburgers
instructions: Season beef and shape into patties.
Grill until cooked to preference.
Serve in buns with toppings.

title: Eggplant Rollatini
instructions: Slice and roast eggplant.
Fill with ricotta and herbs, roll up.
Bake with tomato sauce and mozzarella.

title: Shrimp Tostadas
instructions: Cook shrimp with spices.
Spread beans on tostadas.
Top with shrimp, lettuce, salsa, and cheese.

title: Beef Mince Pie
instructions: Cook beef and vegetables in gravy.
Fill pie crust and cover.
Bake until golden and flaky.

title: Chicken Yakimeshi
instructions: Scramble eggs and set aside.
Stir-fry chicken and vegetables.
Add rice and soy sauce, mix eggs back in.

title: Lamb Kebabs
instructions: Marinate lamb with spices and garlic.
Skewer and grill until charred.

title: Salisbury Steak Pie
instructions: Prepare Salisbury steak mixture.
Fill pie crust and bake until golden.

title: Chicken and Dumplings
instructions: Simmer chicken and vegetables in broth.
Drop spoonfuls of dumpling dough on top.
Cook until dumplings are fluffy.

title: Beef Hotpot
instructions: Layer beef and vegetables in a dish.
Pour over stock.
Top with sliced potatoes and bake until tender.

title: Chicken Cacciatore
instructions: Brown chicken pieces.
Add vegetables, herbs, and wine.
Simmer until chicken is cooked and sauce thickened.

title: Shrimp Ramen
instructions: Cook noodles in broth with miso and soy.
Add shrimp until cooked.
Top with boiled egg and scallions.

title: Beef Chili Mac
instructions: Cook macaroni and set aside.
Prepare chili with beef, beans, and tomato.
Mix with pasta and top with cheese.

title: Stuffed Cabbage Rolls
instructions: Blanch cabbage leaves.
Fill with beef and rice mixture.
Roll up and simmer in tomato sauce.

title: Chicken Souvlaki
instructions: Marinate chicken in oil, garlic, oregano, and lemon.
Skewer and grill until charred.
Serve with pita and sauce.

title: Beef Chow Fun
instructions: Soak noodles until soft.
Stir-fry beef and garlic.
Add noodles, soy sauce, and sprouts, toss well.

title: Moussaka Rolls
instructions: Slice and roast eggplant.
Fill with beef and tomato sauce, roll up.
Top with bechamel and parmesan, bake.

title: Shrimp Tikka Masala
instructions: Cook onion, garlic, and ginger with spices.
Add tomato and cream.
Simmer with shrimp until done.

title: Turkish Beef Manti
instructions: Prepare small dumplings filled with beef and onion.
Boil until cooked.
Serve with garlic yogurt and butter sauce.

title: Chicken Kiev
instructions: Stuff chicken with garlic herb butter.
Coat with breadcrumbs.
Fry and bake until golden and cooked through.

title: Beef Teriyaki
instructions: Marinate beef in teriyaki sauce.
Stir-fry until glazed and cooked.

title: Stuffed Eggplant Casserole
instructions: Hollow out eggplants.
Fill with lamb, rice, and vegetables.
Bake with tomato sauce until tender.

title: Chicken Fried Steak
instructions: Dredge steaks in flour, egg, and flour again.
Fry until golden and crispy.
Serve with creamy gravy.

title: Shrimp Tempura
instructions: Make light tempura batter.
Dip shrimp and fry until crisp and golden.

title: Beef Sukiyaki
instructions: Simmer broth with soy and mirin.
Add beef, tofu, vegetables, and noodles.
Cook briefly and serve hot.

title: Chicken Flautas
instructions: Fill tortillas with chicken and onion.
Roll tightly and fry until golden.
Serve with salsa and cheese.
